title: Plan JSON
description: Structured plan generated by narrator AI for tool execution

requestId.description: Unique identifier for this plan execution

narrative.description: Optional narrative text to display before or during tool execution

parallel.description: If true and dependencies allow, tools run concurrently

disabledSkills.description: Skills that failed in previous attempts; planner MUST NOT select these

toolId.description: Unique ID for this tool within the plan (for dependency tracking)

toolPath.description: Absolute or relative path to the tool executable

input.description: JSON object passed to the tool via stdin

dependencies.description: Array of toolId values that must complete before this tool runs

required.description: If true, tool failure aborts dependent tools; if false, failure is non-blocking

async.description: If true, tool may run in parallel with unrelated tools

RetryPolicy.description: Configures retry behavior for tool execution

maxRetries.description: Maximum retry attempts before marking tool as failed

backoffMs.description: Base milliseconds between retries (exponential backoff: delay = backoffMs Ã— 2^(attempt-1))

PlanMetadata.description: Plan metadata for debugging and replan tracking

parentPlanId.description: If this is a replan, the UUID of the previous plan that failed
